long_desc.thetext:
This is an automatically created tracking bug! It was created to ensure that one or more security vulnerabilities are fixed in affected versions of Fedora.
For comments that are specific to the vulnerability please use bugs filed against the "Security Response" product referenced in the "Blocks" field.
For more information see: http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Security/TrackingBugs
When submitting as an update, use the fedpkg template provided in the next comment(s). This will include the bug IDs of this tracking bug as well as the relevant top-level CVE bugs.
Please also mention the CVE IDs being fixed in the RPM changelog and the fedpkg commit message.
NOTE: this issue affects multiple supported versions of Fedora. While only one tracking bug has been filed, please correct all affected versions at the same time. If you need to fix the versions independent of each other, you may clone this bug as appropriate.
[bug automatically created by: add-tracking-bugs]

Use the following template to for the 'fedpkg update' request to submit an update for this issue as it contains the top-level parent bug(s) as well as this tracking bug. This will ensure that all associated bugs get updated when new packages are pushed to stable.
=====
# bugfix, security, enhancement, newpackage (required) type=security
# testing, stable request=testing
# Bug numbers: 1234,9876 bugs=1396959,1396962,1396963,1396965,1396967,1396971,1396972,1396975,1396977,1396978,1396979,1396980,1396981,1396986
# Description of your update notes=Security fix for CVE-2016-9387, CVE-2016-9388, CVE-2016-9389, CVE-2016-9390, CVE-2016-9391, CVE-2016-9392, CVE-2016-9393, CVE-2016-9394, CVE-2016-9395, CVE-2016-9396, CVE-2016-9397, CVE-2016-9398, CVE-2016-9399
# Enable request automation based on the stable/unstable karma thresholds autokarma=True stable_karma=3 unstable_karma=-3
# Automatically close bugs when this marked as stable close_bugs=True
# Suggest that users restart after update suggest_reboot=False
======
Additionally, you may opt to use the bodhi web interface to submit updates:
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/new

Adding parent bug 1398251 (for CVE-2016-9557). Please use this new fedpkg update template when submitting the update:
=====
# bugfix, security, enhancement, newpackage (required) type=security
# testing, stable request=testing
# Bug numbers: 1234,9876 bugs=1396986,1396959,1396962,1396963,1396965,1396967,1396971,1396972,1396975,1396977,1396978,1396979,1396980,1396981,1398251
# Description of your update notes=Security fix for CVE-2016-9387, CVE-2016-9388, CVE-2016-9389, CVE-2016-9390, CVE-2016-9391, CVE-2016-9392, CVE-2016-9393, CVE-2016-9394, CVE-2016-9395, CVE-2016-9396, CVE-2016-9397, CVE-2016-9398, CVE-2016-9399, CVE-2016-9557
# Enable request automation based on the stable/unstable karma thresholds autokarma=True stable_karma=3 unstable_karma=-3
# Automatically close bugs when this marked as stable close_bugs=True
# Suggest that users restart after update suggest_reboot=False
======

Adding parent bug 1398256 (for CVE-2016-9560). Please use this new fedpkg update template when submitting the update:
=====
# bugfix, security, enhancement, newpackage (required) type=security
# testing, stable request=testing
# Bug numbers: 1234,9876 bugs=1396986,1396959,1396962,1396963,1396965,1396967,1396971,1396972,1396975,1396977,1396978,1396979,1396980,1396981,1398251,1398256
# Description of your update notes=Security fix for CVE-2016-9387, CVE-2016-9388, CVE-2016-9389, CVE-2016-9390, CVE-2016-9391, CVE-2016-9392, CVE-2016-9393, CVE-2016-9394, CVE-2016-9395, CVE-2016-9396, CVE-2016-9397, CVE-2016-9398, CVE-2016-9399, CVE-2016-9557, CVE-2016-9560
# Enable request automation based on the stable/unstable karma thresholds autokarma=True stable_karma=3 unstable_karma=-3
# Automatically close bugs when this marked as stable close_bugs=True
# Suggest that users restart after update suggest_reboot=False
======
I am not able to solve this bz due missing fixes for some of CVE. Please, split this bz to several (for each CVE), so I will be able to fix that CVE, which has been already fixed in upstream.
Removing CVE-2016-9396 CVE-2016-9397 CVE-2016-9398 CVE-2016-9399 not yet fixed upstream.
Removing CVE-2016-9395 not currently planned to be backported.

Created attachment 1268896 Backports of security fixes
Patch against fedora dist-git.
Created attachment 1268897 Additional CVE patch cleanup
jasper-1.900.13-4.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-da0b00fd64
jasper-1.900.13-4.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-cfc20d5d45

jasper-1.900.13-4.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
